name: lastlarf
text: There should be a shirt saying "Don't thank me, thank Anarchy!"

name: ctrl_z
text: A comment left by ctrl_z was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by aliiis, EM2, rascaldom, NDCaesar, Sweetlips, luckypyjamas, empy, Xaxx, morbo)

name: farqussus
text: A comment left by farqussus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mikeronomicon, Deusoma, kenthegod, mercuri0us, Sweetlips, ep2, jimbob)

name: kennisiou
text: lamo = lame-o, right?  Just want to make sure we're on the same page here...  Otherwise?  That chubby I gave you was given in error.

name: farqussus
text: there are no errors

name: redmange
text: Only Malicious intent and feigned ignorance.

name: ssddr
text: It's true, the one Anarchy hurts the most is Denny's.

name: chaesar
text: I dunno, Denny's is usually the local culling ground for pseudo-intellectuals and outcasts, and the fat ones always get milkshakes. That's a money-maker. And I don't think those coffee refills are going to bankrupt them anytime soon either.

name: evolume
text: Their coffee tastes like Anarchy.

name: darthemed
text: Completely against the rules of common decency?

name: luckypyjamas
text: Denny's Coffee: better in theory than in reality

name: redion
text: One fine night we were sitting there eating and one of my buddies was downing the stuff nonstop. we really didn't notice until he was three or four carafes deep. that's abusing the system man.

name: apocowarg
text: Moons Over My Hammy? That's a really good one!

name: apocowarg
text: ~punches himself in the face~

name: morganization
text: i want a framed picture of philippe with a hat on just like the one his mom has

name: theloneliestmonkey
text: I second that

name: sacrificialgoat
text: A comment left by sacrificialgoat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, tttt, twohundredninety, SSDDR, rowboat, aquamuffin, Art-Vader, logic, Wulvaine, Mastronaut, philosophe, morganization)

name: ssddr
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: straw
text:
I think it's pretty easy to photoshop out Phillipe's mom's hair so we just see a picture, but how can I be sure until I do it?

[IMGS OFF]

A few little things I noticed while doing this: this picture is only one without diagonal lines leading from the edge of the picture to the frame except for on the lower left-hand corner, which I've corrected here. I'll leave it to the scholars what the meaning of this omission might be. The frame is a single pixel away from being a true rectangle. The distance from the edge of the picture to the frame is 4 pixels on the left and five pixels on the right. Once more, I'll leave this to the hands of the scholars.

name: aliiis
text: but I am so confused as to why you went to the trouble when you can see the whole picture in panel 2 with no obscuring speech bubble or hair?

name: tekende
text: In the panel above, though, the picture has diagonal lines on all four corners, which is odd to me.

name: layzerblade
text: I'm pretty sure the picture in the bottom panel has diagonal lines on both left corners, which suggests some sort of click-and-drag selection gone awry.

name: greenkoolayd
text: look at a picture frame in real life(or IRL, if you prefer).  the diagonal lines come from a frame that has been assembled from 4 pieces of wood(or whatever material...).

name: morganization
text: i think you're a fool.

name: cailetshadow
text: I am almost entirely positive that Philippe has been photographed doing a one-man version of "Newsies".

name: professorhazard
text: He kind of looks like he's pantomiming the kind of sex that teenagers pantomime in dance clubs these days.

name: epicurus
text: I really love how everything in the anarchist's cookbook helps Philippe be a good son that his mother approves of.

name: professorhazard
text:
-= PHILIPPE =-

-= ONLY USE ANARCHY FOR GOOD =-

-= NEVER EVIL =-

name: luckypyjamas
text:
the phrase that instantly came to mind is "sex anarchist"

i can't explain it, nor would i want to

name: neoboman
text: What is Philippe going to make adorable next? Communism?

name: closefriend
text: You've obviously never seen Philippe do push-ups. "Hammer... Sickle... Hammer... Sickle..."

name: cdl146
text: Read his blog sometime. http://philippesblog.blogspot.com/2006_01_01_archive.html

name: zapatos
text: Cuddlenacht?

name: woodenteeth
text: Oh. Yes. I should have scrolled.

name: woodenteeth
text: As it turns out Facism and in particular The Third Reich! Hilarity ensues!

name: serf
text: this is the only time anarchy has ever been good for anything

name: hereward
text: Anarchism is pretty much the main alternative political movement at the moment. It is healthy and coming up with good ideas.

name: jargonmaster
text:
Philippe is basically every crimethinc. member, ever.

EVER - all of them have no doubt been born after the McDLT and thus have no business stompin' around and actin' all punk

name: deusoma
text: I like how Anarchist Phillipe wears a Batman shirt. Batman doesn't really have anything to do with anarchy, but somehow it fits the situation.

name: honesttom
text: Batman is hell of anarchic. All driving a tank round Gotham, all concealed weaponry in his belt, pissing all over the police.

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by idsyen, cailetshadow, SotiCoto)

name: charchar
text: But, Batman did entirely subvert the natural order by becoming a vigilante and he is the most successful superhero without the benefit of powers. Batman is the best kind of anarchist: the kind who gets it done.

name: tekende
text: BRUCE WAYNE: HE GETS THINGS DONE.

name: tbtabby
text: Tell that to this guy.

name: jamb23
text: I think Reginald D. Hunter had a set where he ragged on Batman for basically being the opposite of an anarchist - rich head of a corporation uses his money to clean up the street by beating up, among others, terrorists and poor people.

name: relaxing
text: Further listening: Atom and His Package - Anarchy Means I Litter.

name: n00b
text: Wouldn't the net cost of the ground up aspirin and lemon juice be more than just another stamp?

name: cailetshadow
text:
both Aspirin and lemon juice have many other anarchical uses, can be bought in bulk, and the proceeds benefit the ruling body much less directly than postage.

::"did you know" star::

name: godfatherofsouls
text: I dig Lyle's smooth wrist as he corrects Philippe's terminology.

name: rowboat
text: What? No one's going to write the rest of the words to the song to make sure that we know that they know?

name: kelsotimebomb
text: BOO TO THAT

name: idsyen
text: I turned a friend who is a member of an active Anarchist group onto Achewood by showing him this strip.

name: em2
text: I guess Phillipe didn't really need to go to sleep.

name: skaterpix
text: Philippe is so innocent!

name: kovatch
text: Don't Thank me, Thank Anarchy!

name: yogurtworld
text: Lyle gets so worked up he starts speaking in Italics.

name: berami
text: I can only hope that one day I too will have a five year old who tells me "don't thank me! Thank anarchy!" How precious.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Please remember that when you ask him to clean his room or basically any chore, and he's telling you
"No, mom, F-O-A-D,
don't thank me, Thank Anarchy!".

name: carlyle
text:
Phillipe is a good son.

But how do you pronounce it? Fill-ee-pay? Or Fill-eep?

name: karljw
text: Fill-eep, which I believe is how it is pronounced in French. It'd only be Fill-ee-pay if there was an accent on the terminal e (don't ask me which kind, one of the slanty ones; i speak spanish where there's only one direction)

name: carlyle
text: It called l'accent aigu I think in French but I could be wrong because I failed the class when trying.

name: landowmpg
text: Yea, in french it's called accent aigu (acute accent), the other way is accent grave. And it's definitely pronounced "fill-eep". Philippe's father was French, hence the spelling. It is also my name. My father is also French-Canadian. I suffer the mangling of the spelling and pronunciation of my name as well, so I'm hell of aware when people do it to Philippe .

name: link
text: I can't.. I can't look at her the same way since that guest strip.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: 50 Simple Things Kids Can Do to Smash the State
